title: About pbe account
body: can we still sign up a pbe account?

replies.body: [PBE applications](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) are still available.  Are you running into any issues?
I am running into a problem. I can't access the site to apply to the PBE server can you please help me

Is it a 500 error?  WE're currently investigating reports on this to find out more.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can gather more info on this.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
